title: Can't Select Chroma pack color In Dynamic que?
body: So last season I mained Vayne and got the dragonslayer skin and the chroma pack with it. But now that the new que has rolled around there is no way to select my chroma pack color.

replies.body: I have the same problem. Not just with {{champion:67}} but with other chroma pack champions. Please address this.
Its also with garen and Lucian

Hey RubyRoyalCow -

This issue will be resolved when Patch 6.2 goes out!
